title: New song is about to drop!
content:
Heck yes. An epic remix of my own, I should say.
Chicken Invaders is my childhood game, and listening to its orchestral OST drove me to make the new remix. It'll be available soon!

Spoiler Alert: CI4 Victory Theme.

title: Long time no see.
content: Haiii. Well it's been a long time, isnt it? I should say, many things happened that I barely had time to update anything. But hey, at least I'm not going to abandon my blog page, alright? :D

title: Poison...
content: My server's general chat was flooded with a heck load of poison's debates. Expired poison is poisonous or not?! Ah... Very headache.

title: My discord bot was flagged...
content: Unfortunately, Youtube flagged my bot as bot (average messages), so that most users cannot play audio from any youtube link through my discord bot because the server where it hosting the bot was flagged. Only SoundCloud available now... Not know how and what to do... 😢

title: Ack...
content: Some recent day I feel like I'm in a hallucination, or...maybe just sleepy state. Because I felt quite odd, often forget and often lost focus than the other days. Sigh... guess I'll need to have a proper sleep time... 😢

content: I swear if it fails now Imma having a bad time...

title: Rules? Hmm...
content: I was in a conversation earlier this time, and a friend of mine discussed about something in my discord server related to the external server's rules. About the "No spam" category, yes. Hmm, from what I read, it was like "Well, you're allowed to spam in this channel, but not other channels. I'll kaboom you if you dare to spam". He tries to express something else about it, but due to a language barrier, and his language isn't natively English, we had a bit hard time to understand xd. Very oopsie.

title: Sworn and...well...
content: In my discord server, someone just saying inappropriate words. I think I'll moderate this, because rules exists!

content: I have made change to make all the posts be always visible! YIPPEE!

title: Let's get it be completely persistent!
content: I have made change to the server which will serve the posts be always visible even when the local server is offline. Welp!
